About Me

Let me tell you a little about Myself

BIO

Hello and thanks for stopping by. My name is Craige Hart and I am a self taught Front End Developer and live in Torquay, Devon.
I specialise in creating interactive and user-friendly interfaces, designed and coded from the ground up. I am very passionate in the projects that I am given or taken on. I have been coding and building for about a year now and its been by far the best career decision I have made.
I am always looking for a challenge to push myself to learn new and exciting things, designs and languages.
If you have a project in mind and need help building it then please feel free to message me and get the ball moving. Send me a Message.

Responsive Website Design

With Responsive Design it make your website completely multi-device compatiable from desktops to smartphones.

Front-End-Development

As a Front End Developer I tend to code everything from scratch, and bringing design and ideas to life in the web browser.

Languages

As a Front End Developer my languages cover the areas that I specialise in. These are as follows.

HTML
